basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Sebastian Mendoza. I enjoy connecting with people and solving complex problems. I love chess and Rubik's cubes. I'm a jiu-jitsu/mixed martial arts fanatic. Currently a real estate agent and software developer.

projects.title: Health
projects.description: For 2022, my health will be my first priority. This includes everything from my physical health to my mental health. Nutrition, exercise, and sleep are the focus points in which I will work on the most.

projects.title: Chess
projects.description: I'd love to become a NM (National Master) in the USCF by the end of 2022. This is a very time-consuming and challenging  task, but I'm excited to see what I can accomplish. Nevertheless, I'll continue to work on my chess skills.

projects.title: Jiu-Jitsu
projects.description: Ever since I began training jiu-jitsu earlier this year, I fell in love with the art. I'd like to get back into training and get my blue belt.
